comment.author: 35034346184@N01
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hank_Ketcham_(American_football) Ketcham was born in Englewood, New Jersey. After attending the Hotchkiss School, he enrolled at Yale University. He played every game for Yale's varsity football team in 1911, 1912, and 1913. He helped lead Yale to a 7-2-1 record in 1911 and a 7-1-1 record om 1912 and was a consensus All-American in both of those years. In 1913, Ketcham was selected as the captain of Yale's football team. which puts this in 1913 some time.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Edward Vielmetti: Thanks for the additional information.We'll add his full name and the date to the source data next time we update.
